title: 更困难的生存，只需1条命令
author: what_name
txt_content:
好久木有发(shui)帖了呢
于是我就发了我的困难生存OOC!

进入正题！






：啊~今天真无聊啊~
：杀一头猪吧~

：&*$***..$#@&# (我是无辜的!)

：WTF?我杀猪为何还会掉血?



[fly]几个小时以后[/fly]


：天黑了.....

：we are coming！

：WTF？我被僵尸打了一下就感染了？



[fly]又过了几个小时[/fly]

：终于天亮了

：$*&#..#$& （乱叫）

：WTF？僵尸为何没燃烧？


[fly]几分钟后[/fly]

：LOLOLOL！这ooc真好玩

：WTF？

：我用了困难生存ooc！



功能(前方大量GIF！)















如果你觉得困难生成ooc对你有用，请用金粒和人气砸我1下
如果你觉得困难生成ooc对你非常有用，请用金粒和人气砸我10下
如果你觉得困难生成ooc对你没有用，请用金粒和人气砸死我
有用才是硬道理!



指令！
summon MinecartCommandBlock ~ ~3 ~ {Command:"kill @e[type=MinecartCommandBlock,r=1]",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:tellraw @p {text:"\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n                  \u00a73\u00a7l|---|===|-困难生存-|===|---| \n\u00a7d                          By what_name\n\n               \u00a7e\u00a7o-----------------------------------\n                       \u00a7c'其实一点也不困难!'\n               \u00a7e\u00a7o-----------------------------------\n\n"},Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/gamerule commandBlockOutput false",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/scoreboard objectives add break dummy,Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:/fill ~2 ~-3 ~ ~6 ~-3 ~8 stained_hardened_clay 5,Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~4 ~-2 ~-1 wall_sign 0 replace {Text1:"",Text2:"{text:\\"\u00a73-\u00a74删除\u00a73-\\",clickEvent:{action:\\"run_command\\",value:\\"/fill ~2 ~-1 ~-1 ~-2 ~3 ~9 air\\"}}"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/fill ~4 ~-2 ~ ~4 ~-1 ~ stained_glass 14",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/fill ~2 ~ ~ ~6 ~ ~8 stained_hardened_clay 5",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-2 ~1 command_block 0 replace {Command:"fill ~1 ~ ~ ~1 ~1 ~6 wool"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~5 ~-2 ~1 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/fill ~-1 ~ ~ ~-1 ~1 ~6 redstone_block"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/summon FallingSand ~4 ~-0.5 ~1 {TileID:152,Time:1}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~6 ~-1 ~ stained_glass 5 replace air",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/fill ~2 ~-2 ~ ~2 ~-1 ~8 stained_glass 5",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/fill ~6 ~-2 ~ ~6 ~-1 ~8 stained_glass 5",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/fill ~6 ~-2 ~8 ~2 ~-1 ~8 stained_glass 5",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-2 ~2 command_block 0 replace {Command:"scoreboard players add @e[type=Zombie] break 1"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~5 ~-2 ~2 command_block 0 replace {Command:"scoreboard players add @e[type=Skeleton] break 1"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-2 ~3 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[type=!Player,score_break_min=500] ~ ~ ~ /fill ~1 ~1 ~1 ~-1 ~ ~-1 air 0 destroy"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~5 ~-2 ~3 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/scoreboard players set @e[type=!Player,score_break_min=500] break 0"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-2 ~4 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/entitydata @e[type=Zombie] {Fire:-10s}"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~5 ~-2 ~4 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/entitydata @e[type=Skeleton] {Fire:-10s}"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-2 ~5 command_block 0 replace {Command:"execute @e[type=Zombie] ~ ~ ~ /scoreboard players set @a[r=2,score_Damage_min=1] inf 1"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/scoreboard objectives add Damage stat.damageTaken",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/scoreboard objectives add inf dummy",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~5 ~-2 ~5 command_block 0 replace {Command:"scoreboard players add @a[score_inf_min=1] inf 1"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-2 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"tellraw @a[score_inf_min=2,score_inf=2] [\\"\n\u00a7c你被僵尸感染了\\"]"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~5 ~-2 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/effect @a[score_inf_min=1] 20 2 3 true"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-2 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/effect @a[score_inf_min=194] 20 0 0"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~5 ~-2 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/scoreboard players set @a[score_inf_min=195] inf -1"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-1 ~1 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/scoreboard players set @a[score_Damage_min=1,score_inf_min=1] Damage 0"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~5 ~-1 ~1 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/effect @a 17 2 4 true"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-1 ~2 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/tp @e[type=Zombie,r=15] ~ ~-9999 ~"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~5 ~-1 ~2 command_block 0 replac {Command:"/tp @e[type=Skeleton,r=15] ~ ~-9999 ~"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-1 ~3 command_block 0 replace {Command:"scoreboard players set @e[type=Sheep] neu 1"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~5 ~-1 ~3 command_block 0 replace {Command:"scoreboard players set @e[type=Pig] neu 1"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-1 ~4 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/scoreboard players set @e[type=Chicken] neu 1"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~5 ~-1 ~4 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/scoreboard players set @e[type=Cow] neu 1"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/scoreboard objectives add neu dummy",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/scoreboard objectives add attack stat.damageDealt",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-1 ~5 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[score_neu_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /effect @a[r=3,score_attack_min=1] 7 1 0"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~5 ~-1 ~5 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/execute @e[score_neu_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /execute @a[r=3,score_attack_min=1] ~ ~ ~ /execute @e[score_neu_min=1,r=3] ~ ~ ~ /particle angryVillager ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0.1 1"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"setblock ~3 ~-1 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/scoreboard players set @a[score_attack_min=1] attack 0"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~5 ~-1 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/gamemode 0 @a[m=1]"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~5 ~-1 ~6 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/gamemode 0 @a[m=2]"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~3 ~-1 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:"/gamemode 0 @a[m=3]"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/setblock ~5 ~-1 ~7 command_block 0 replace {Command:"为了强迫症患者而放置的命令方块"}",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/time set 16233",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/gamerule doDaylightCycle false",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"/gamerule naturalRegeneration false",Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~ ~-1 ~-1 redstone_block,Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:setblock ~ ~ ~-1 command_block 0 replace {Command:fill ~ ~-3 ~ ~ ~ ~1 air},Riding:{id:MinecartCommandBlock,Command:"",Riding:{id:FallingSand,TileID:157,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,TileID:152,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,TileID:1}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码

replies.author: lofivo
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: lcplcplcp
replies.txt_content:
嗯 只需要1条命令
嗯对 一条

replies.author: ⑨
replies.txt_content: 事实上如果轮CB的数量应该不止1条命令 标题具有误导性（OVO）

replies.author: 白色的麋鹿
replies.txt_content: 好像并不能使用，版本1.10食用测试无效

replies.author: hqqaazz
replies.txt_content:
不错，就是少了点，比如说给其他生物加东西的，而且打猪掉血这个不科学..
另外这个破方块，我要是原地叠高，这僵尸没办法了吧？
论如何利用僵尸生存获得基岩

replies.author: 晴路卡
replies.txt_content:
1.8啊...
如果做一个Cber还是紧跟最新版吧XD
好高级的感觉  好高端的说

replies.author: wangbw
replies.txt_content:
可以这很强势
比较讲究实际
看生化危机这部片就知道了

replies.author: 莉莉霍瓦特
replies.txt_content: 这玩应获取食物都很困难
